title: Transport API Query - Porto Alegre
description: Angular system for querying public transportation in Porto Alegre, integrating with the Bus and Lotação API and displaying routes on MAPBOX.

title: ApiRick
description: Angular application that uses 'The Rick and Morty API' to provide information about characters, episodes, and locations from the animated series.
